abstract: Peer39, an online advertising start-up, has lassoed $10.5 million in a third round of funding led by Evergreen Venture Partners.
snippet: Peer39, an online advertising start-up, has lassoed $10.5 million in a third round of funding led by Evergreen Venture Partners.
lead_paragraph: Peer39, an online advertising start-up, has lassoed $10.5 million in a third round of financing led by Evergreen Venture Partners, PaidContent.org said. Existing investors, including Canaan Partners, Dawntreader Ventures and JPMorgan, contributed, the publication said.
